posts.title: Datatable Component
posts.summary: Data tables display information in a grid-like format of rows and columns. They organize information in a way that’s easy to scan so that users can look for patterns and develop insights from data.

posts.title: Dynamic Datatable
posts.summary: Data tables display information in a grid-like format of rows and columns. They organize information in a way that’s easy to scan so that users can look for patterns and develop insights from data.

posts.title: Release: @cxl/ui 3.1.0
posts.summary: Style improvements, bug fixes and more.

posts.title: Single Page Application Routing
posts.summary:
There are three main ways we can handle application routes, all of them have
pros and cons, which one is best, depends on your usage. This post describes routing techniques for Single Page Applications.
posts.author: giancarlo84
